attributes.action: Grant a State Funeral for the last veteran of the Great War (1914-1919)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Grant a State Funeral for the last veteran of the Great War (1914-1919). For the continued remembrance of all those who fought and lost their lives for our great nation. Other nations that campaigned, have granted this great honour on there repective last surviving veteran. I therfore petition the PM and our Government for this privilage to be bestowed upon the passing of our last surviving veteran. The people of Great Britian owe a debt of gratitude to all those who made great sacrifices in this most horrific of wars. Such a state occasion would be a fitting tribute to the last surviving veteran, and all those  committed to the rememberance of this conflict and all other conflicts in which British troops and civilians have lost their lives.
